dimensions:
A. Warp: 63.5 cm (25 in.)
     Weft: 71 cm (28 in.). (Edges cut.)
B. Warp: 59 cm (23 1/4 in.).
     Weft: 45 cm (17 1/2 in.) (Edges cut.)
title: Les Lois de Lycurgue
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave
description: Three scenes (one complete only when lengths would be sewn together) of Lycurgus teaching the youth of Sparta. Full repeat not present. A and B are necessary to complete a partial width.
name: Fragments
